formatted_address: Central Catchment Nature Reserve, 601 Island Club Rd (Located close to Singapore Island Country Club, via Venus Drive, Singapore
name: Petaling Boardwalk

reviews.text:
🌿After walking across the scenic Tree Top Walk, the one-way Petaling Boardwalk lead back down to Sime Track, enroute passing by a few Shelter Hut.
🌿These shelters served as rest point and rain shelters.
🍀Petaling Boardwalk is a more strenuous trail that involve climbing up and down stairs, plenty of them, before getting to a more level boardwalk.
🌱At its lowest, the boardwalk span across a small stream, and then gradually leads back to Sime Track.
🍀Petaling Boardwalk is the compulsory Trail down from Tree Top Walk.
🌱Fun fact:
Petaling is the name of the Petaling Tree.

vicinity: Central Catchment Nature Reserve, 601 Island Club Rd (Located close to Singapore Island Country Club, via Venus Drive
